name: Kawai Slender
description:
Kawai Slender est un essai de jeu de type Slender, utilisant des modles Low Poly et Unreal Engine 4, et créé durant une série de tutoriels UE4 sur Youtube.

Vous devez ramasser les cookies pour terminer le jeu.

Kawai Slender is an attempt to make a Slender Game, using LowPoly models ans Unreal Engine 4, and made during a long series of french tutorials on Youtube.

You have to pickup cookies to finish the game.
